text: Drom is a commune in the Ain department in eastern France. In the commune there is a dairy selling comté cheese, butter, cream, fromage blanc and newly resurrected medieval fromage de CLON made from local milk, and three 'Artisans d'art'. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Ain department ==References== *INSEE ==External links== *Official website Category:Communes of Ain Category:Ain communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia
title: Drom
